document_data.name: Permanent Image
document_data.mainbody: '''''Permanent image''''', also known as '''''permanent illusion''''',<ref> was an [[Arcane magic|arcane]] [[illusion]] spell that conjured an illusion more convincing than its lesser ''image'' cousins.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned in the same manner as ''[[silent image]]'', but in addition to providing an image it also included elements of sound, smell and temperature. Furthermore, its duration was unlimited. The caster could let the image move while concentrating, otherwise it remained still.
document_data.Material components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, ''permanent image'' required a [[material component]]: a small piece of [[fleece]] and [[jade]] powder of a value of 100 [[gold piece]]s in the casting.
document_data.History: The spell was credited to the [[Netherese arcanist]] [[Toscudlo]] in {{Yearlink|-1474}} and was originally called '''''Toscudlo's permanent illusion'''''.
